member_organisations:
The MTA as a "public body"  has approx. 15 thousand members (organized in 11 scientific sections), and it runs a research network (10 research centres, 5 research institutes, and appr. 140 groups at Hungarian universities and other public institutions. 
 
MTA's Scientific Sections: 
http://mta.hu/english/scientific-sections-105963   
 
MTA's research centres and research institutes: 
http://mta.hu/english/mtas-research-centres-and-institutes-106085   
 
All organisations as members have their activities in Hungary.
